001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import java.time.Duration;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008import dev.failsafe.Bulkhead;
009import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
010import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
011
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
014
015public class QueueMiddleware implements Middleware, AutoCloseable {
016
017    private final FailsafeExecutor<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> failsafeExecutor;
018
019    public QueueMiddleware(final int maxConnections, final Duration maxWaitTime) {
020        final Bulkhead<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> bulkhead = Bulkhead.<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> builder(maxConnections)
021                .withMaxWaitTime(maxWaitTime)
022                .build();
023        this.failsafeExecutor = Failsafe.with(bulkhead);
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(ApiHttpRequest request,
028            Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
029        return failsafeExecutor.getStageAsync(() -> next.apply(request));
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public void close() {
034    }
035}
